issue.title: [CF 892] Region Check
issue.body:
Hi there and thank you for the awesome add-on
I'm running ver 6.2.6 and using it to basically tell me what I want to know when I want to know it.
The only thing I'm still trying to figure out is if it's possible to have the add-on check if I am in the right region to use a specific item or spell.
I have partially been able to set this up using instance type settings but that's only half working so my question is there a way to have the add-on check location info and show/hide icons based on that info?

If no I would greatly appreciate you adding this condition

Greetings from Amsterdam.


> Posted by CurseForge user H3nkdet4nk | Imported from CurseForge issue #892 | Raw

comments.body:
What item in particular are you wondering about? Some items can be checked for this, but other icons cannot.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Overgrown lilly-pad I want the icon to show up only in Pandaria.


> Posted by CurseForge user H3nkdet4nk

Apologies for being so slow to respond to your ticket. Put this in a Lua condition:

``` GetCurrentMapContinent() == 6 ```

This won't work when the world map is open and you are viewing a continent other than Pandaria.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Tank you for the response :)


> Posted by CurseForge user Henkdetank

@Cybeloras: Go

It seems to only work when the "currentmap" actually is Pandaria so for example it will hide the icon while I'm inside shrine of two moons I think if I can find all "currentmaps" numbers where this item is usable it will work as intended or maybe I should try to exclude them all the other maps anyway I think I know how to make it work now


> Posted by CurseForge user Henkdetank
